speaker: stan
text: How's it going Dipper? You get all the signs up yet?

speaker: stan
text: You know back in my day, if I slacked off like you kids do I would've went to the mines.

speaker: dipper
text: Oh really? What were they mining?

speaker: stan
text: Oh, you know... Rock... Rock stuff.

speaker: stan
text: What's with all these questions?! Go hang up those signs, I'm losing customers!
